It's Portal, whats not to love. The community has many mods, maps and is awesome. Single Player, Co-Op. Time Travel, You name it, I'm sure someone has made it or about to. Build your own maps, play other peoples. If you like to test your mind, you'll find some easy and almost impossible ones here.
